00012 FixedWindowMEGenerator::FixedWindowMEGenerator(TMEGeneratorOptions* opts):
00013         TVMuonEventGenerator("FixedWindow",opts){
00014         fEventWindow=opts->GetDouble("event_window",10);

00017 int FixedWindowMEGenerator::Init(const SourceDetPulseMap& detectorPulsesIn){
00018     for(SourceDetPulseMap::const_iterator i_source=detectorPulsesIn.begin();
00019             i_source!=detectorPulsesIn.end();++i_source){
00020         // if i_source->source is muSc then
00021         if(i_source->first.matches(IDs::channel(IDs::kMuSc))){
00022             // if source is wildcard then select fMuSc 
00023             if(!fMuSc.source || fMuSc.source->isWildCardChannel()){
00024                 fMuSc=Detector_t(i_source);
00025             }else{
00026                 cout<<"FixedWindowMEGenerator: Error: Multiple muSc TDP sources found"<<endl;
00027                 return 1;
00028             }
00029         }else{
00030             fDetectors.push_back(Detector_t(i_source));
00031         }
00032     }
00033     return 0;
00034 }
00035 
00036 void FixedWindowMEGenerator::Reset(){
00037     fMuSc.Reset();
00038     for(SourceList::iterator i_det=fDetectors.begin();
00039             i_det!=fDetectors.end(); ++i_det){
00040         i_det->Reset();
00041     }
00042 }
00043 
00044 int FixedWindowMEGenerator::ProcessPulses(MuonEventList& muonEventsOut,
00045         const SourceDetPulseMap& detectorPulsesIn){
00046     static bool init=true;
00047     if(init) {
00048         int error=Init(detectorPulsesIn);
00049         if(error) return error;
00050         init=false;
00051     }else{
00052         Reset();
00053     }
00054 
00055     // Loop over all muons
00056     for(DetectorPulseList::const_iterator i_muSc=fMuSc.pulses->begin();
00057             i_muSc!=fMuSc.pulses->end(); ++i_muSc){
00058         // Make a TME centred on this muon
00059         TMuonEvent* tme=new TMuonEvent(*i_muSc, fEventWindow);
00060 
00061         // Add all muon pulses in the event window to this TME
00062         AddPulsesInWindow(tme,fEventWindow,fMuSc);
00063 
00064         for(SourceList::iterator i_det=fDetectors.begin();
00065                 i_det!=fDetectors.end(); ++i_det){
00066             // Add all pulses in the event window to this TME
00067             AddPulsesInWindow(tme,fEventWindow,*i_det);
00068         }
00069         //if(Debug()) cout<<"FixedWindowMEGenerator::ProcessPulses:"
00070         //    " Created TME with "<<tme->TotalNumPulses()<<" pulses" <<endl;
00071 
00072         // Add TME to list of event
00073         muonEventsOut.push_back(tme);
00074     }
00075     return 0;
00076 }
00077 void FixedWindowMEGenerator::AddPulsesInWindow(
00078         TMuonEvent* tme, double window, Detector_t& detector){
00079     // Get the central time for this event;
00080     double central_time=tme->GetTime();
00081     double early_edge=central_time-window;
00082     double late_edge=central_time+window;
00083 
00084     // advance the start and stop iterators that define the range of pulses
00085     // contained in the window
00086     DetectorPulseList::const_iterator& start=detector.start_window;
00087     DetectorPulseList::const_iterator& stop=detector.end_window;
00088     const DetectorPulseList::const_iterator& end=detector.pulses->end();
00089     //const DetectorPulseList::const_iterator& begin=detector.pulses->begin();
00090 
00091     // skip empty lists
00092     if(start==end) return;
00093 
00094     // Move the iteator for the start of the window
00095     int look_ahead=1;
00096     while((start+look_ahead!=end) && (start!=end) ){
00097         double time = (*(start+look_ahead))->GetTime();
00098         if(time==definitions::DefaultValue){
00099             // If time is DefaultValue then we're looking at an unpaired
00100             // detector which we should ignore
00101             ++look_ahead;
00102             continue;
00103         }
00104         look_ahead=1;
00105         if(time>early_edge) break;
00106         start+=look_ahead;
00107     }
00108     // Move the iteator for the end of the window
00109     stop=start;
00110     while( stop!=end ){  
00111         double time = (*stop)->GetTime();
00112         if(time>late_edge) break;
00113         ++stop;
00114     }
00115 
00116     // Add all pulses in the current window to the tme
00117     tme->AddPulses(*detector.source,start,stop);
00118 
00119     // Flag if we've used all of a channels pulses
00120     if(stop==detector.pulses->end()) tme->AllPulsesUsed(*detector.source);
00121 }
